attributes.action: Allow students of Moat CC to go out of school premises during lunch.
attributes.background: Action needs to be taken because most of the people in our school go out to eat and if that stops then there will be long queues. A lot of people go home as well due to the fact they do not like school dinners or don't have the money to pay for it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an decision for your school. You could raise this with your school's governing body.
